A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was shocked at how stupid some of the scenes were;  don't be a hero\, oh wait\, be a hero; follow orders\, oh wait\, don't follow orders when you have love; there is good and evil\, oh wait\, the evil have better ideas than the good; introduce new characters\, oh wait\, we don't need them; don't let your army die; oh wait\, let's be happy that everybody died.  Horrible movie.   The jedi have died.
